text: The Division of Riverina-Darling was an Australian Electoral Division for the Australian House of Representatives in the state of New South Wales. The division was created in 1984. It was abolished in 1993. It was named for the region of Riverina and the Darling River. It was located in the towns of Broken Hill, Griffith, Hay and Narrandera. The Division of Watson (1934–69) replaced it when it was abolished. ==Members== Member Party Term Noel Hicks National 1984–1993 Riverina-Darling Category:1984 establishments in Australia Category:1993 disestablishments in Australia
title: Division of Riverina-Darling
